arts.ttl: Big Match Verdict: Familiar issues plague Bolton Wanderers in Mansfield defeat
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers dropped down to 10th in the League One table after defeat at Mansfield Town - five points off the play-off pace.

arts.ttl: Mansfield start 2025 with hard-earned home win over Bolton
Year in review: An inconsistent 2024 points in one direction at Bolton Wanderers
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers have been a difficult team to describe in 2024, and their inconsistencies have piled significant pressure on the next few months.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mansfield Town vs. Bolton Wanderers - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's League One clash between Mansfield Town and Bolton Wanderers, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
